basic_info.description: My name is Marni Hager. I'm a software developer with a background in manufacturing engineering for aerospace companies. As a manufacturing engineer, I have learned to optimize various types of processes, including mapping out the steps of a process and determining which are value added and which are waste. I have translated this into code in more recent years at my job by automating processes that were taking a full day into something that takes less than an hour. My current goal is to find a job that will allow me to combine my skills as a manufacturing engineer with being a programmer.

projects.title: Escape Room for Kids
projects.description: An online escape room built for kids ages 6-10 to introduce them to the mechanics of how online escape rooms work.  Three puzzles implemented modals and utilized local storage.  (Partner: David Turner)

projects.title: BusMall
projects.description: Project that allows users to view three images of products at one time and select their favorite.  There are 15 voting rounds.  Following the voting rounds, users may view how many times and image was shown, as well as how many times it was selected, in a bar graph format.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Project that demonstrated the use of HTML, CSS, and Javascript which calculated the number of cookies sold by various stores in a table format.  Data could also be added to the table and would be added to the calculations.
